content: If someone wanted to help with -Zbuild-std and -Zbuild-std-features, where would be the best place for them to coordinate and figure out what needs doing? Here?

Here would be good. Most of the current todo is in https://github.com/rust-lang/wg-cargo-std-aware/issues. The next big thing on my list is better panic=abort support, but I haven't started, so that would be a good thing to figure out.
@Eric Huss Awesome. We have several folks from Linux Plumbers Conference who would like that to work for use in the Linux kernel.
